title: The Rundown Live #742 – Consensus Vs. Science, Healthcare, Global Warming, Food Health
cleaned_text:
What is the difference between science and consensus and what does scientific consensus really mean? On today’s program we discuss increasingly the uneasy relationship

 between hard science and public policy.

Topics: MIlitary Runs Mass Casualty Drills, CDC Forced To “Adjust” Sunday’s Florida “Record” COVID Count Lower By Almost 50% After State Health Department Cries Foul On Data, 50% of respondents are in favour of requiring proof of a coronavirus vaccine for “indoor activities such as restaurants, gyms and performances,”
